chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
aemi: applied_entries_monotonic_interface
smci: state_machine_correct_interface
si: sorted_interface
lacimi: lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
client: clientId
id: nat
out: output

Goal:
forall tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)), {in_output_trace client id out tr} + {~ in_output_trace client id out tr}

Premises:
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
in_output_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ in_output_list client id o os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments in_output_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive raft_input (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := Timeout : raft_input | ClientRequest : clientId -> nat -> input -> raft_input Arguments raft_input {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments Timeout {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments ClientRequest {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive raft_output (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := NotLeader : clientId -> nat -> raft_output | ClientResponse : clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output Arguments raft_output {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments NotLeader {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope Arguments ClientResponse {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
key_in_output_trace_dec : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))), {key_in_output_trace client id tr} + {~ key_in_output_trace client id tr}
Build_output_correct_interface : (forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client id out tr -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net))) -> output_correct_interface
Record output_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_correct_interface { output_correct_invariant : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client id out tr -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net)) } Arguments output_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
output_correct_invariant : forall (client0 : clientId) (id0 : nat) (out0 : output) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client0 id0 out0 tr -> output_correct client0 id0 out0 (applied_entries (nwState net)) where ?orig_base_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi : applied_entries_monotonic_interface smci : state_machine_correct_interface si : sorted_interface lacimi : lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface lmi : log_matching_interface client : clientId id : nat out : output |- BaseParams] ?one_node_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi...
key_in_output_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ key_in_output_list client id os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments key_in_output_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _%list_scope
in_input_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists h : name, In (h, inl (ClientRequest client id i)) tr : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments in_input_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
key_in_output_list_dec : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (os : list raft_output), {key_in_output_list client id os} + {~ key_in_output_list client id os}
in_output_list_dec : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (os : list raft_output), {in_output_list client id o os} + {~ in_output_list client id o os}
applyEntries_spec_ind : applyEntries ?h ?st ?es = (?os, ?st') -> forall P : raft_data -> Prop, (forall (d : data) (cc : list (clientId * (nat * output))), P (RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output ?st d) cc)) -> P ?st' where ?es : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi : applied_entries_monotonic_interface smci : state_machine_correct_interface si : sorted_interface lacimi : lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface lmi : log_matching_interface client : clientId id : nat out : output |- list entry] ?h : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams...
do_name_eq_dec : forall x y : do_name, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?P : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi : applied_entries_monotonic_interface smci : state_machine_correct_interface si : sorted_interface lacimi : lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface lmi : log_matching_interface client : clientId id : nat out : output |- BaseParams] ?DiskOpMultiParams : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi : applied_entries_monotonic_interface smci : state_machine_correct_interface si : sorted_interface lacimi : lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface lmi : log_matching_interface client : clientId id : nat out : output |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P]
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi : applied_entries_monotonic_interface smci : state_machine_correct_interface si : sorted_interface lacimi : lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface lmi : log_matching_interface client : clientId id : nat out : output |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi : applied_entries_monotonic_interface smci : state_machine_correct_interface si : sorted_interface lacimi : lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface lmi : log_matching_interface client : clientId id : nat out : output |- Type]
is_output_with_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (trace_entry : name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) => let (_, s) := trace_entry in match s with | inl _ => false | inr os => if key_in_output_list_dec client id os then true else false end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> name * (raft_input + list raft_output) -> bool Arguments is_output_with_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
handleInput = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (inp : raft_input) (state : raft_data) => match inp with | Timeout => handleTimeout me state | ClientRequest client id c => handleClientRequest me state client id c end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), name -> raft_input -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments handleInput {orig_base_params raft_params}
is_input_with_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (trace_entry : name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) => let (_, s) := trace_entry in match s with | inl (ClientRequest c i _) => (if clientId_eq_dec client c then true else false) && (id =? i) | _ => false end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> name * (raft_input + list raft_output) -> bool Arguments is_input_with_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
handleClientRequest_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleClientRequest_commitIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', l) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net'
handleClientRequest_logs_sorted : forall (h : name) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (net : network), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, st, l) -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted_host net -> sorted (log st)
step_failure_disk_ops_sind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out0 : list output) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (do_pDst p) failed -> do_net_handlers (do_pDst p) (do_pSrc p) (do_pBody p) (nwdoState net (do_pDst p)) = (ops, out0, d, l) -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := do_send_packets (do_pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwdoState := update do_name_eq_dec (nw...
step_failure_disk_ops_ind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out0 : list output) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (do_pDst p) failed -> do_net_handlers (do_pDst p) (do_pSrc p) (do_pBody p) (nwdoState net (do_pDst p)) = (ops, out0, d, l) -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := do_send_packets (do_pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwdoState := update do_name_eq_dec (nwdoState...
key_in_output_list = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (os : list raft_output) => exists o : output, In (ClientResponse client id o) os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> list raft_output -> Prop Arguments key_in_output_list {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _%list_scope
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output -> list entry -> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
in_output_list = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (os : list raft_output) => In (ClientResponse client id o) os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> list raft_output -> Prop Arguments in_output_list {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
step_failure_star_raft_intermediate_reachable' : forall (n' : list Net.name * network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init n' tr -> raft_intermediate_reachable (snd n')
step_failure_star_raft_intermediate_reachable : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> raft_intermediate_reachable net
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
step_failure_star_raft_intermediate_reachable_extend : forall (f : list Net.name) (net : network) (f' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star (f, net) (f', net') tr -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net'
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) ->...-> logs_sorted net } Arguments sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _)%function_scope
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data Arguments applyEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _%list_scope
is_client_response_with_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : raft_output) => match out with | NotLeader _ _ => false | ClientResponse c i _ => (if clientId_eq_dec client c then true else false) && (id =? i) end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> raft_output -> bool Arguments is_client_response_with_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope

```coq
```coq
intro tr.
induction tr as [| h t IHtr].
- simpl. intros. unfold key_in_output_trace. unfold in_output_trace. destruct (existT _ _ (exist _ _)). intuition.
- simpl. intros. unfold key_in_output_trace. unfold in_output_trace. unfold IHtr. destruct (existT _ _ (exist _ _)).
  destruct (existT _ _). intuition.
Qed.```
